title: Pot roast beef with braised vegetables
ingredients: ['2 rindless smoked bacon rashers', '1 tbsp vegetable oil', '1.5kg boned, rolled and tied beef topside or thick flank', '8 large carrots, peeled and thickly sliced', '2 onions, coarsely chopped', '4 garlic cloves, crushed', '2 x 400g cans chopped tomatoes', '250ml red wine', '250ml beef stock', '1kg small new potatoes, scrubbed and halved', '2 tsp cornflour', '15g fresh basil, chopped', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
